game.name: Stigmata of Sacrilege
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Upon her initiation into the Sisters of Exorcism, Sophie is blessed with a sign from the Lord that she is fated to become the next saint. Now, she must overcome her trials for sainthood and seek blessings from various holy sites.
